channel.title: Authors on Kira Li
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Kira Li

item.description:
I’m an undergraduate engineering student specializing in cellular bioengineering. I chose to study biomedical engineering because I want to be able to apply engineering skills and concepts to the life sciences/medicine. Especially in the midst of the global COVID-19 pandemic, there is a clear need for medical innovation.

In my free time, I love to read books, go on walks, and play music.
